cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure on March 24, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1921, To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to reauthorize the Lake Pontchartrain Basin Restoration Program, and for other purposes

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 49 (Tuesday, March 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GRAVES of Louisiana:
H.R. 1921.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 1 of the United States
Constitution
[Page H1414]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to reauthorize the Lake Pontchartrain Basin Restoration Program, and for other purposes.
